reviewText: The fairy tales are nice and I chose this DVD because of the classic tales, but because of the low standard of animation, this is not as exciting and watchable as the recent animated cartoons. I will not recommend this DVD.

I have loved these stories as a child and wish to pass them on to my children and their friends.  Unlike new animated fairytales on film, these encourage more listening and imagination... almost as good as a grown up reading a book.
